reviewText: This movie is the bomb I can't wait for perch 3 to come out July 4th I believe can't wait

this is a awesome movie. this second addition to the purge series takes you beyond the home and out on the streets. in a way this one is a little bit more scarier than the first movie. because people are being hunted by the rich so they can purge. the acting is good and the story is good. this is a good movie. if you have not seen this movie then i recommend you do
